translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

This will be presented to you by the merchant Natálio Rusca, for whom the Government allocates all the butcher cattle so far entrusted to Your Lordship Napoleone Castellini, from Montevideo, contracted for the army.

Therefore, Your Lordship

May God preserve Your Lordship Secretariat of Finance in Piratini, February 11, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima. General Commander of Police of the Department of Alegrete.

February — 11 — 39. Almeida.

Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima, General Commander of Police of the Municipality of Alegrete. From the Ministry of Finance.
